609480.name: Fantasy Grounds - ETU: Horror for the Holidays (Savage Worlds)
609480.description:
Happy Holidays!

The Christmas spirit has descended upon Pinebox. Its a time for celebration, a time for relaxation, and perhaps a time when the forces of darkness would give the world some gosh darned peace and quiet.
Unfortunately, this year the Christmas spirit is an actual spiritand it doesnt care if youve been naughty or nice. The spirit of the last man to be publicly lynched in Texas has risen, and hes on the trail of a young Freshman at East Texas University.
Oh. And he looks like Santa Claus.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Savage Worlds Ruleset
Suggested: East Texas University Savage Worlds setting
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jaime Pierson
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
